subtitle:
Join the Nordic Solar partner program
and earn up to 8% from each deposit made by the person you referred.
our_referral: <0>Our referral program</0> is designed to help you earn additional income <1>just by inviting your friends.</1> The more people you refer, the higher your <2>earnings!</2>
how1_descr: Fill in the required fields and create an account on the Nordic Solar platform to gain access to the referral program.
how2_descr: Go to your personal account, find the 'Referral Program' section, and obtain your unique referral link.
how3_descr: Share your referral link on social media, blogs, via email, or even mention it in personal conversations.
how4_descr: Help your referrals understand the platform’s features and answer their questions to make it easier for them to get started.
how5_descr: Visit your personal account regularly to track the activity of invited users, the number of new registrations, and the commissions you’ve earned.
footer_text: Our partner program is a simple and effective way to earn passive income. Invite your friends, help them become part of our community, and earn from their every step. The more active your network, the greater your income. Join now and start earning today!
